text: niraash man lie ve laut aae
ramesh ne bahut samajhaaya dhaadhas bandhaaya ve nahin maane
amit chup tha
bilkul gumasum
usane svayan ko asahaay paaya veena ke lie kuchh karana chaahata tha koee jaadootona nahin jaanata tha jo kuchh kar paata
veena thee ki hansee bhool gaee thee
bas baatabaat par aansoo bahaatee thee
lekin na jaane kis mittee kee thee ki vah dev kee buraee nahin sun paatee thee
dev kee dev ke parivaar kee buraee karane vaala use apana dushaman lagata tha

yahaan tak ki apanee badee bahan suneeta bhee buree lagane lagee thee jabase usane dillee aakar dev ke prati dherasee shikaayaton ka pulinda veena ke sammukh khola tha apanee hamadardee jataee thee usane jab veena ke prati yah kah kar ki  veena
tumhaare saath dhokha hua hai chalo yahaan se
nahin rahana tumhen yahaan dev ke saath
kya diya hai usane tumhen
naukaraanee se bhee badatar jindagee ban gaee hai tumhaaree
yah sunakar veena bahut roee thee
aur jab chup huee to do shabd bolakar usane suneeta ka munh band kar diya tha  badee bahan ho phir bhee apanee chhotee bahan ka suhaag ujaadana chaahatee ho
mujhe nahin chaahie tumhaaree hamadardee
mere dev mein koee khot nahin
yadi dosh hai to keval mere bhaagy ka
bas aaj ke baad tum is vishay mein koee baat nahin karana
kuchh der to suneeta chup rahee lekin badee bahan thee usakee
hitaishee bhee thee veena ko bolane se rah nahin paee  tum kaun se yug kee baat kar rahee ho sachchaee tumhaare saamane hai
vah ro rahee thee aur roterote bole ja rahee thee  mujhe dev se shaareerik sukh nahin praapt hua isaka mujhe koee gam nahin
meree shaareerik bhookh se jyaada badee bhookh mere man kee hai
mera man dev ko paakar trpt ho gaya hai
use beemaaree na hotee to kya kamee thee usamen bolo jab vah deharaadoon aaya tha to kaisa laga tha tumhen devataon kee chhavi dekhee thee tumane bhee usamen
kaisa tej usake chehare par mahasoos kiya tha
aaj vah apanee jindagee ke lie tadap raha hai to main use chhod jaoon itanee jaldee saath chhodane ke lie nahin huee meree usase shaadee
vah achchha insaan hai usase tab tak bandhee hoon jab tak vah hai
usaka naam hai
vah nahin rahega abhee se usakee kalpana nahin kar sakatee
abhee aasha hai shaayad koee chamatkaar ho jae
usake nahin to mere bhaagy se hee
veena chup huee to suneeta ko us par bahut pyaar aaya
use apanee baanhon mein bhar kar use puchakaarate hue bolee  main tumhaare man ko samajhatee hoon
lekin pagalee main teree dushaman hoon kya tujhe yoon tilatil kar palapal bitaate dekhakar main chup dekhatee rahoon
achchha lagega mujhe aisa tere saath bachapan bitaaya hai saara
har khushee har duhkh mein saath din bitaaye hain
mujhe achchha nahin lagata tera yah roop main kya karoon koee upaay mere paas bhee to nahin kaash main koee jaadoochamatkaar kar sakatee
lekin kya hai dikhata kuchh nahin bas dhokhe ke sivaay
meree buddhi mere hisaab se hee chalatee hai
tab suneeta bhee bahut roee thee
reeta dev ke saath khaalasa kolej mein lekcharaar thee
dev se milane aaee
tab dev so raha tha
vah veena ke paas baahar hee baith gaee
dev ke vishay mein poochhane ke baad vah bolee  kal mere ek rishtedaar aae the ghar
unhonne mujhe bataaya ki yahaan dillee baardar par ek gaanv hai bakolee
vahaan ek baaba jee rahate hain anaath aashram bana rakha hai unhonne
saath hee vah jadeebootiyon se kaee asaadhy beemaariyon ka ilaaj karate hain
tum ek baar dev ko lekar vahaan chalee jao
shaayad kuchh chamatkaar ho jae
reeta kee baat sunakar veena ke chehare par aasha kee kiran chamak uthee
vah bolee  haan jaroor jaoongee main
kal hee
abhee amit aaega aap use sahee pata bata dena
tab reeta ne kaha  pata bilkul aasaan hai
aleepur se aage bakolee gaanv mein jaakar kisee se bhee poochh lena bakolee vaale baaba jee ka pata
phir kuchh sochakar reeta bolee  tum kaho to main apane rishtedaar ko lekar kal subah aa jaatee hoon
naheennaheen aap kasht na karen
mere saath amit jaega
koee pareshaanee hogee to main aapako bata doongee
veena ke chehare par aasha kee kaee kiranen chamakane lagee theen
reeta chalee gaee aur veena apanee saas ke paas jaakar sab baat bataane lagee
dev abhee so raha tha
subah saat baje hee dev veena aur amit bakolee pahunch gae
aashram dhoondhane mein koee kathinaee nahin huee
aashram mein us samay praarthana ho rahee thee
un sabhee ko vahaan pahunch kar bahut achchha laga

vaheen khade ek sajjan se unhen jaanakaaree milee ki baaba jee ne is praangan mein anaath bachchon ke rahane kee pooree vyavastha ke saathasaath ek paathashaala bhee khol rakhee hai aur subah ke samay lagabhag chaar ghante rogiyon ko nihshulk davaeeyaan baantane ka kaary bhee karate hain
vaheen ek chabootare par jaakar teenon baith gae
abhee unase pahale keval ek vyakti aur vahaan baitha tha
dasapandrah minat kee prateeksha ke baad baaba jee vahaan aa gae
tab tak kareeb bees log vahaan aa chuke the
dev ka nambar doosara hee tha
baaba jee ne dev kee naadee kee pareeksha kee
phir bole  pet kee beemaaree se grast ho tum lekin ab rog badh chuka hai
jee baaba jee mera teen varsh pahale opareshan hua tha aur mera guda hee nikaal diya tha
abhee dev ne itana hee kaha tha ki baaba phir bole  oh to tumhaare krtrim mal dvaar banaaya hua hai
aur kainsar dubaara phail gaya hai
dev ko aasha nahin thee ki baaba ko itanee jaanakaaree hogee
usaka vishvaas jo ki veena ka banaaya tha svayan badh gaya baaba ke prati
sveekrti mein dev ke haath svatah hee jud gae
tab baaba bole  dekho beta tumhaara rog itana adhik badh gaya hai ki main tamhen kuchh nishchit hokar nahin kah sakata
lekin eeshvar kee banaee huee is prakrti se kaee jadeebootiyaan mainne ikathtee kee huee hain
unake sevan se tumhaare vikaaron ka veg kam jaroor ho jaega
aage sab usee eeshvar par nirbhar karata hai
main tumhen davaee de deta hoon niyamit roop se isaka sevan karate rahana
tab baaba jee ne unhen prateeksha karane ko kaha aur bheetar apanee kutiya mein chale gae
baahar laute to unake haath mein ek liphaapha tha jisamen kaee jadeebootiyaan padee theen
apane ek shishy ko unhonne pukaara aur samajhaaya  sabako pees kar kapade se chhan kar do aur inakee baraabar tees pudiya bana dena
phir dev ke aamukh hokar bole  nity chaar pudiya khaanee hongee doodh ke saath
chaay khatta sab band
halka khaana aur rasadaar phal khaate rahana
dard ke lie tel bhee abhee doonga
tab dev veena va amit ne jhuk kar baaba jee ke charan sparsh kiye
aur vaheen mandir ke baraamade mein jaakar baith gae
davaee taiyaar hone mein abhee der thee
ekaek sab badalane laga
dar vyakti ko bahut ksheen kar deta hai
maanasik tanaav mein beemaaree kee gati bhee teevr ho jaatee hai
man achchha hai to sab achchha lagata hai
man duhkhee to sab badalaasa lagane lagata hai
veena ne dekha dev bujhasa gaya hai
chehare ka tej lupt ho gaya hai usaka
ghar mein jab bhee akela padata na jaane kya sochakar aansoo bahaane lagata
kaaya bhee ksheen pad gaee thee usakee
daanyee taang ab dard ke kaaran neeche nahin rakh paata tha
jab bhee uthata veena ka sahaara lekar ya phir laathee ke sahaare
samay kee maar ne use adhamara kar diya tha
aaj veena ka sahaara tha ya phir is laathee ka sahaara
vahee laathee jo vah apane baaboojee ke lie khareed kar laaya tha kabhee unako budhaape mein sahaara dene ko aaj vah usaka sahaara banee huee thee
aur doosaree laathee use veena ke roop mein eeshvar ne pradaan kar dee thee
na jaane usake kin achchhe karmon ka parinaam thee veena jisane usake jeevan mein aakar jeene kee tamanna badha dee thee
veena ko dekhakar aansoo barabas usakee aankhon se bah nikalate the
aur veena thee na jaane kis mittee kee banee gudiya
is duniyaan mein aaee badee huee byaah rachaaya sundar kalpanaen kee apane bhavishy kee
aur dekhatedekhate sabhee kalpanaen pankh laga kar ud gaeen
jeevan ke aise saty kee usane kabhee kalpana nahin kee thee
rotee thee kabhee baatharoom mein jaakar kabhee amit ke paas baithakar kabhee krshna kee godee mein sir rakhakar lekin dev ke saamane aakar bhool jaatee thee apane sab duhkh
bas use hee dilaasa detee thee
baaba jee kee davaee se koee chamatkaar nahin hua
kisee saadhumahaatma ko khaana khilaakar chamatkaar nahin hua
mahaamrtyunjay ka jaap karake bhee koee phal saamane nahin aaya
haan ek maheena aur beeta to paaya ab sir ke pichhale bhaag mein koee phoda sa nikal aaya hai
dev ne chhua use halkaasa dard mahasoos hua
veena ko apane munh se bataana chaah kar bhee nahin bol paaya
bas rundhe gale se bola  ab kuchh nahin shesh bacha veena
ab meraatumhaara kuchh dinon ka aur saath rah gaya hai
bas ab main chala jaoonga
rulaee rok nahin paaya dev
veena ne suna dekha use nikat aakar dev ke sir mein haath pherane lagee
dev shaayad yahee chaahata tha
pal bhar mein veena ko pata chal gaya ki kyon phir se dev aaj vahee puraanee baat duhara raha hai
ye kya dev ekaek yah phoda kaise ho gaya  veena dev ke sir ke baalon ko apanee anguliyon se hataate hue bolee  raat tak to kuchh nahin tha
bas ab kuchh nahin raha shesh
lagata hai ye kainsar mere shareer mein phail gaya hai
dev ke aansuon ka veg badhane laga tha
dev aisa mat bolo
apane man ko kaaboo mein rakho
abhee kuchh nahin hua
abhee chalate hain doktar ke paas vahee bataega kya hai yah  veena bolee jaise abhee bhee doktar ka sahaara shesh bacha ho usake paas
eeshvar par vishvaas rakhane ko bhee to kaha tha
bolee veena  dev ab tum kuchh hath na karo
mujhe de do sab chintaen apanee sab duhkh apane
main rok sakee to rok loongee sab kuchh
ab tum mere bhaagy ko mujhe svayan banaane do
tum ab mere vishvaas ko sahaara do
mujhe apane lie kuchh karane do
veena ro bhee rahee thee lekin apanee vedana ko apane shabdon mein vyakt karane kee koshish bhee kar rahee thee
dev ne samajha use
usake manobhaavon ko
samajhaaya svayan ko aur bola  tum jo kahogee jo chaahogee vahee karoonga
tum aansoo na bahao jahaan le chalogee vaheen chaloonga
bas ab chalo baaba jee ke paas
veena ne nirnay sunaaya  tumhen main jhatapat taiyaar karatee hoon ab jo bhee hoga dekh lena chamatkaar hee hoga
sach kee roshanee itanee teevr ho chukee thee ki veena kee aankhen chaindhiyaasee gaee theen usamen
kuchh shesh dikhaee dena band ho gaya tha
sach kaisa hai isaka varnan to vah band aankhon se kar nahin sakatee thee
use lag raha tha sach hai usaka dev
dev ka jeevan jise usase koee chheen nahin sakata
